title: UKTV.Porridge.Inside.Out.3of3.PDTV.x264-MVGroup
description:
To mark the 40th anniversary of Porridge, Gold is going behind the scenes of the classic sitcom in a three-part series featuring rarely seen material and iconic scenes from the show.

3. Good Behaviour
The final part of this tribute series to the classic sitcom looks at life after Porridge, the spin-off series Going Straight and the death of Richard Beckinsale.
